I really enjoyed this restaurant experience.  The people running the place were very friendly and helpful with the menu.  I had the miso ramen, and it was incredible.  The broth was piping hot and perfectly seasoned and the noodles were filling.  I also had the curry pork.  YUMMY!  I will definitely be back to try the other items on the menu.  I've got my eye on the onigiri with anchovy.
